#### 解 Written in English ############

Evaluate the given statement regarding the confirmation letter for a manager and select the most appropriate combination of numbers that is correct. When an auditor performs both company law supervision and financial product transaction supervision on the same company, they can obtain only the management confirmation letters related to financial product transactions.

Answer: [×]

### Explanation ###

The statement provided contains a mix-up in terms of what is permissible under certain conditions during an audit. According to Japanese accounting standards and regulations, when an auditor performs both company law supervision (経営法監査) and financial product transaction supervision (金融商品取引監査), they are not restricted from obtaining management confirmation letters related to either area. However, the statement incorrectly suggests that only financial product transaction-related confirmation letters can be obtained under these circumstances.

The
